definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: So how can we not be concerned about the reserves during the transition period?
sentences.chinese: 過渡時期我們不過問儲備金行嗎？

sentences.english: Bunin's short stories in his transitional period have a unique and complete aesthetic value.
sentences.chinese: 蒲寧過渡時期的短篇小說具有獨特而完整的審美價值。

sentences.english: Now look in chapter 9,though,then you get a transition period.
sentences.chinese: 現在看第9章，這是過渡時期。

sentences.english: All of us who knew transience understood that what happened in Beijing stayed there.
sentences.chinese: 經歷過過渡時期的人都知道在北京的住下來的情形。

sentences.english: All countries go through it in their own time.
sentences.chinese: 所有國家都按照自己的時間經歷人口過渡時期。

sentences.english: Several adjustments in personnel have been made to the composition of the first cabinet of the interim President.
sentences.chinese: 過渡時期臨時政府內閣人員已經做了一些調整。

sentences.english: In other words, it is in the transitional period from extensiveness to intensiveness.
sentences.chinese: 或者說，是處於粗放型向集約型轉變的過渡時期。

sentences.english: In the second week of the transition, the pace picked up.
sentences.chinese: 進入過渡時期的第二週後，節奏加快了。

sentences.english: I am that the Shijiazhuang occupation Tec computer is 000 be a director.
sentences.chinese: 我是石家莊職業過渡時期的計算機是000的董事。

sentences.english: Leafage is the forms of Chinese ancient book binding in transition period.
sentences.chinese: “葉子”是古籍過渡時期的裝幀形態。

sentences.english: Now, this need for a transition period does not apply to all types of welfare.
sentences.chinese: 現在，並非所有類型的福利都會需要一段過渡時期。

sentences.english: But forecasts at times of transition are inherently unreliable.
sentences.chinese: 但過渡時期的預測根本不可靠。

sentences.english: Many people are still old enough that having to make the digital transition has become a way of life.
sentences.chinese: 許多年紀稍長的人目睹了數位化生活的過渡時期。

sentences.english: Sui and Tang dynasties era is the period of the middle ancient times transiting to modern Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 隋唐時代，爲中古漢語向近代漢語過渡時期。

definition: important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
outward devotion but inner opposition (idiom); to pay lip service/to agree overtly, but oppose in secret
principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
